bug.summary: The Harvester GUI keeps fetching buffers while it's pausing drawing images on the canvas.
bug.description:
Describe the bug The Harvester GUI keeps fetching buffers while it's pausing drawing images on the canvas. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Launch the Harvester GUI. Connect a camera. Start image acquisition. Click the pause button.
Expected behavior The Harvester GUI must not fetch buffers while it's pausing drawing images on the canvas. Screenshots None. Desktop (please complete the following information): None. Additional context None.
